thread.title_full: Fran Drescher in form-fitting dress at Broadway play | Daily Mail Online

author: Sarah Jones For Dailymail.Com
title: Fran Drescher in form-fitting dress at Broadway play | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Her honey mane locks fell effortlessly in loose tendrils which she swept to one side to feature her flawless complexion. The New York native highlighted her natural beauty by keeping her makeup to a minimum but added a smokey matte eye and glossy mauve lip. Brilliant in blue! The 59-year-old Nanny star oozed radiance in a figure-hugging cocktail dress which showcased her phenomenal physique Blinged out! The New York native rounded out her evening look with a simple diamond necklace and dainty hoop earrings A pair of black stilettos gave extra height to her frame and she rounded out her evening look with a simple diamond necklace and dainty hoop earrings. Fran made an appearance at the star-studded show which runs for 10 weeks and will close two months later on April 23. The musical stars Jake Gyllenhaal who portrays George in the revival of Sunday In The Park With George with music and lyrics by Stephen Sondheim and book by James Lapine. A-list actor! The musical stars Jake Gyllenhaal who portrays George in the revival of Sunday In The Park With George with music and lyrics by Stephen Sondheim and book by James Lapine The Oscar-nominated actor stars alongside Broadway's Wicked actress Annaleigh Ashford. The play was inspired by the 1884 Georges Seurat painting A Sunday Afternoon On The Island Of La Grande Jatte and follows artist 'George' in the months leading up to the famous painting. The original off-Broadway production opened in July 1983 starring Mandy Patinkin as George and Bernadette Peters as Dot. Limited lineup: The Broadway play runs at the Hudson Theatre for 10 weeks and will close two months later on April 23 Share or comment on this article 12
